name: THESINS//004 : THE OTHER MAN
description:
ACT//004. PAVILION SCENE.

As the day passes by, I knew that this gaze was long overdue.
May stared at Tom, the man who make her days don’t seem that bad anymore. Tom smile and strokes her hair, she felt her stomach hurt in a good way. ‘What if Carl found out about us?’ May worried this bliss won’t last long. ‘Some things are meant to be kept.’ Tom said.
There was a look of ecstasy on his face. Sometimes, we ignore truths for temporary feelings.
